description: This file contains the JwtUtil class responsible for creating and validating JSON Web Tokens (JWTs). It provides methods for generating tokens with claims and parsing tokens to retrieve claims, using the io.jsonwebtoken library.

classes.name: JwtUtil
classes.description: A utility class for creating and validating JWTs, including signing with a secret key and setting expiration.

methods.name: JwtUtil
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the JwtUtil with a secret key and token expiration time.

methods.name: generateToken
methods.description: Generates a JWT token for a given username and additional claims, with an expiration time.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Parses a JWT token to retrieve its claims, validating the signature.
